member.name: M:SqlTransfLib.core.transformation.delegates.Transformations.InitQueryFormating(System.String,SqlTransfLib.core.transformation.delegates.QUERY_TYPES@)
member.remarks:
Functions inspects the beggining of query to deterimne what kind of query is it about. Is it about SELECT or INSERT for example.
Then functin returns appropriate Transform function.

member.name: M:SqlTransfLib.utilz.SQLStringUtilz.ExtractTablesFromSelectQuery(System.String)
member.summary: This function will extract all tables SELECT query wants to get data from or if select gets data from inner queries

member.name: M:SqlTransfLib.utilz.SQLStringUtilz.FindTablesAndExtractThem(System.String)
member.summary: This function extract tables name from query.
member.param: we will get query like this 'from table1,table2'

member.name: M:SqlTransfLib.utilz.SQLStringUtilz.DivideIntoSeperateQueries(System.String,System.String[]@,System.String@)
member.summary: It takes query like this(SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM inside) as b ) and seperate into SELECT * FROM as b and SELECT * FROM inside
